datasets.name: CS:GO Professional Matches
datasets.description: 25K+ professional CS:GO matches from Nov 2015 to Mar 2020. Includes match results, map picks, economy data, and player performance statistics.

datasets.name: CS:GO Cheating Dataset
datasets.description: Viewangle data from both cheaters and legitimate players in CS:GO, published March 2022.

datasets.name: Counter-Strike 2 Telemetry
datasets.description: 50GB of telemetry data from 1,300 CS2 matches containing 83 billion data points including positions, angles, and actions.

datasets.name: CS:GO Competitive Matchmaking Damage
datasets.description: Damage and grenade statistics from over 410,000 rounds of competitive CS:GO matches.

datasets.name: CS:GO Cheater Detection Dataset
datasets.description: Player statistics and VAC ban status from VACBanned.com and VAClist.net for machine learning analysis.

datasets.name: CS:GO Cheating Calculator Dataset
datasets.description: 1,622 CS:GO player profiles with Steam64 IDs, stats, and VAC status. Includes 1,300 experienced players and 1,200 banned players.

datasets.name: CS:GO Pro Players Dataset
datasets.description: Comprehensive dataset of professional CS:GO players and their statistics.

datasets.name: PUBG Telemetry API
datasets.description: Official PUBG API documentation for accessing match telemetry including player positions, actions, and events. Data retention limited to 14 days.

datasets.name: PUBG Analysis Dataset
datasets.description: PUBG match and death data analysis project with approximately 60 million observations from Kaggle.
